name: heck this bag of chips in particular
name_original: heck this bag of chips in particular
description:
the humans are at it again. a plastic bag in the marianas trench? really?

time for our seaslug hero to spring into action. arrow keys to move, space to shoot bubbles to defeat enemies and clear your path.

music is "Itty Bitty 8 Bit" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
